title: Sheraton hotels -- typeface?
content:
Anybody know what their typeface is? (Used for "Sheraton" as well as the individual location names.)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141030072232im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SheratonLettering_3700.gif)
author: mister_eaves

comments.content: It is said [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20141030072232/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=25373) by the very reliable Graphic6 (Robert), that this was a custom typeface called Sheraton (in two weights). You could use a modified [Craw Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20141030072232/http:/www.identifont.com/show?60V) as a substitute, Philippe says, also a reliable one.
